name: Outdoor Research Crocodile Gaiters - Men's
description: Technical and tough gaiters for climbing and hiking. Rugged Cordura panels hold up to abrasion and prevents crampon punctures. A slightly larger circumference ensures they fit over mountaineering boots.Upper panel is 3-layer GORE-TEX® with an abrasion-resistant 70-denier nylon face.Lower panel is hard-wearing 1000-denier Cordura® nylon.Overlapping hook-and-loop closure is easy to put on and take off.Reinforced bootlace hooks keep gaiters in place.Buckle top closure provides a tight seal.Adjustable TPU-reinforced polyester webbing instep strap holds up to trail and mountain abuse.
